015package com.google.common.cache;
016
017import com.google.common.annotations.GwtCompatible;
018
019/**
020 * Calculates the weights of cache entries.
021 *
022 * @author Charles Fry
023 * @since 11.0
024 */
025@GwtCompatible
026@FunctionalInterface
027public interface Weigher<K, V> {
028
029  /**
030   * Returns the weight of a cache entry. There is no unit for entry weights; rather they are simply
031   * relative to each other.
032   *
033   * @return the weight of the entry; must be non-negative
034   */
035  int weigh(K key, V value);
036}
